misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm.
description: The code is using AES algorithm which is generally considered secure. However, the key size is not specified which means it will use the default key size. It is recommended to explicitly specify the key size to ensure sufficient encryption strength.
recommendation: Set the key size explicitly, for example: keyGen.init(256) to specify the key size as 256 bits.
